{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASRock |model=X10 |revision=R |asin=B074PXNRFQ |newegg=N82E16833368002 |price=140 |est_release_date=05/27/2016 |fcc_date=03/03/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=wireless router, IoT hub |fcc_id=2AFEB-X10 |ic_id=20403-X10 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NE626J3R, E062600; |cpu1_cspeed=717 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L25635FMI-10G |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NE626J3R, E062600; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NE626J3R, E062600; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075;Q, QCA8075, 0VV, PEP3840, U561401; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Front-End Module;Skyworks;SKY85308-11;SKY1, 5308, U6ME;2; ,,, 5GHz Front-End Module;Skyworks;SKY85716-11;SKY1, 5716, 543X;2; ,,, ZigBee MCU;TI;CC2630;CC2630, F128, TI 511, ANTV G4;1; ,,, LoRa Transceiver;Semtech;SX1276;SX1276, 1612, 70612.1;1; ,,, 8-Bit Micro-Controller;SONiX;SN8F27E93L;SONiX, 8F27E93LJ, 15BSATB3T;1; ,,, ARM-Cortex M4 MCU;STMicroelectronics;STM32F401;F401BY6, A5002VQ, TW 547;1; |flags=MU-MIMO,ZigBee,LoRA,IR remote |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }}
:• '''867Mbps''' - 2-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''400Mbps''' - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''1300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1300 IoT Router}} :[http://www.asrock.com/Networking/X10/ Product page] FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/2AFEB-X10 2AFEB-X10] (2017-03-03) :The [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3301474 FCC Doc's] indicate.. *The X10 is a router with Zigbee *The X10R and X10S is a router with Zigbee + LoRA (Sub-G) Noted power supply in the FCC test report is an APD WB-18D12R. {{see also|ASRock G10|Google Wifi (NLS-1304-25)}} ===News=== *[http://www.asrock.com/news/index.asp?id=3342 ''Computex 2016: ASRock'' on '''ASRock'''] *[https://3dnews.ru/933851 ''Computex 2016: ASRock'' on '''3DNews'''] (RU) *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/asrock-shows-off-its-x10-iot-router-at-computex-2016.32924/ ''Computex 2016: ASRock X10'' on '''SNBforums'''] *[http://mysmahome.com/product/32338/product-introduction-x10-iot-roughter-long-range-ac1300-router/ ''AsRock X10 IoT Router'' on '''MySmaHome'''] :'''WiFi Router''': :• Modes: Supports Router/AP/Repeater/Bridge multiple working modes :• MU-MIMO: Dual-band Multi-User MIMO and Beamforming technologies : that enhance WiFi performance in multi-user environment :• VPN Server: Supports L2TP/IPSec and OpenVPN server function : '''Home Automation Hub''': :• [[ZigBee]]: Built-in ZigBee radio to support various ZigBee devices and : sensors including Philips Hue bulb, Samsung Smartthings and more :• IR Remote Control: Rich IR cloud database for all home devices :• Translation Remote Control: Remote control router and IoT devices : across countries through P2P technology and cloud services *[http://www.techbang.com/posts/43865-computex-2016asrock-x10-internet-wireless-router-lora-and-integrated-zigbee-protocol ''Computex 2016: ASRock X10'' on '''TechBang'''] (CN) :Support ''ASRock LT10 LoRA Tracker'' (images) __NOTOC__
